original_title: What a Man Wants, What a Woman Needs
overview: Sammy's hard work has made him successful, and his success has turned him into a workaholic. Now, his wife, children and other loved ones are starting to feel neglected, and Sammy must rethink his priorities or risk losing everything that truly matters to him in this heartwarming drama. R&B stars Shirley Murdock and Keith "Wonder Boy" Johnson star in this stage adaptation of the inspirational book by Bishop Eddie Long.
title: What a Man Wants, What a Woman Needs
